divs: sighting detailswe were traveling on rt. 93 northbound and around 10pm we were passing exit 1 (rockinham mall). ahead of us my wife and i spotted a reddish\orangish light. we both watched it as we got closer, and she said to me "do you see that?". i rolled down my window and stuck my head out. it was a single light, about 200 feet above the ground, hovering. i tried to see if a structure obscured stars as we passed, but i didn't spot that, suggesting that the object was no bigger than the light itself. my wife said it could have been a floating lantern.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around November 24th 2011
Summary: reddish/orangish light, about 1ft in diameter hovering about 200 feet over Rockingham Mall
